description: Cliff Parker is gone fishing ... Hot House style! Blond boy-next-door Dax Kelly chases a dollar bill attached to a fishing line into Parker's apartment, only to find Parker standing in the hallway with the real bait hanging between his legs! Kelly immediately goes down on Parker's rock hard tool. Parker throws Kelly on the stairs to return the favor. Parker sits down on the stairs and Kelly climbs on in a reverse cowboy that spins Kelly's cock helicopter-style with each thrust. Parker brings it home and they both explode all over Kelly's tight stomach. That's a lot of bang for your buck!
title: Sure Thing, Scene #01
